declareWinner(PApplet) - Method in class cardgames.BlackJack
Draws a message either congrulating the victor or informing the player of his or her loss

draws the playing board, the players hand, and all necessary buttons
draw(PApplet, int, int) - Method in class cards.Card
draws the card based on its suit and number

Draws the Gamemenu and lets the player navigate from there
